mapper.select: SELECT ur.* FROM t_user_rates ur inner join t_user_rates urp on urp.channel_id = ur.channel_id and urp.user_id = #{parentId} and urp.status = '1' inner join t_channel c on c.id = ur.channel_id and c.status = '1' inner join t_channel_payments cp on c.id = cp.channel_id and cp.status = '1' where ur.user_id = #{id}
